name: Bean Scripting Framework Rexx Engine
short_description: Bean Scripting Framework Rexx Engine (bsf4rexx) allows Java programs to call Rexx programs, and for Rexx programs to create and manipulate Java objects. The package will allow to script OpenOffice.org: http://wi.wu-wien.ac.at/rgf/rexx/bsf4rexx/current/
